entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
